channel.title: Posts on R4football
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on R4football

item.title: England Premier 2016/17 Part One, loading data
item.description: This is the first post on this site actually dealing with looking at football data. The data used is freely available from football-data.co.uk. Having downloaded the data I will first load it into R and have the full data set loaded into my environment.
